vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to stop, cease, desist, forego, cease to be, leave undone, forbear
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to cease, come to an end
1a2) to cease, leave off
vocabInfos._es_Definition: qal   cesar o abstenerse de estar involucrado en una actividad o un estado particular
